name: PyTest
helpMarkDown: The *Run Python tests* task will install and use [PyTest](https://pytest.org) to run your test suite. You should add a "Publish Test Results" task after this in order to see your test status in the build results page.
author: Steve Dower

inputs.name: testroot
inputs.label: Root directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Root directory to run tests from.

inputs.name: patterns
inputs.label: Test file patterns
inputs.helpMarkDown: Files to execute tests from. If empty, all tests within the root directory are executed.

inputs.name: testfilter
inputs.label: Filter
inputs.helpMarkDown: Filters tests that should be executed. Passed to PyTest as `-k` option.

inputs.name: resultfile
inputs.label: Results File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Location to store test results in JUnit format. Add a "Publish Test Results" task to associate these results with your build.

inputs.name: resultprefix
inputs.label: Results Prefix
inputs.helpMarkDown: Prefix to add to test names. The `%winver%` variable will contain `sys.winver` from the version of Python being executed.

inputs.name: doctests
inputs.label: Run doctests in all modules
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select to also execute all doctests discovered in test files.

inputs.name: codecoverage
inputs.label: Enable code coverage reports
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select to enable code coverage report writing.

inputs.name: pylint
inputs.label: Enable pylint reports
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select to enable pylint report writing.

inputs.name: dependencies
inputs.label: Dependencies
inputs.helpMarkDown: Packages to install prior to running tests. Prefix with `--upgrade` to ensure you have the latest version.

inputs.name: pythonpath
inputs.label: Python
inputs.helpMarkDown: Directory containing the `python.exe` to use. By default, the last install added by either the Install Python or Use Python task will be used.

inputs.name: workingdir
inputs.label: Working Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Working directory for running the build. By default, the root source directory will be used.

inputs.name: clearcache
inputs.label: Clear PyTest cache at start of run
inputs.helpMarkDown: Clears cached data from previous runs.

inputs.name: tempdir
inputs.label: Temp directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Base temporary directory. Each Python version creates its own subdirectory.

inputs.name: abortOnFail
inputs.label: Abort on failed test result
inputs.helpMarkDown: Abort the build if any tests fail. **NOTE:** You will need to set any subsequent Publish Test Result task to always run, or you will not see your test results.
